name: BlindSight Demo
description:
BlindSight is a platform fighter with a deep and creative combo system built on fluid movement that is easy to pick up and rewarding to master.

Come to our Discord and we'll help you find a match!

Help support our Kickstarter so we can fill out the roster, complete rollback netcode, and give this game the visuals it deserves!

Nothing shows what makes BlindSight unique better than our characters. Check out the character showcases to really see what makes this game great.
Remmington Character Showcase

Lilem Charater Showcase

Socket Character Showcase

As well as our unique 3v3 game mode, Crews, with player controlled assists!
Crew Battle Game Mode

DISCLAIMER: This is a Alpha Demo build and glitches are possible. If you discover a glitch or need help with the Demo, feel free to post in our Discord.

Features:

  • 2-6 player local versus
  • 3 versus 3 assist based game-type, Crew Battle
  • Simple and accessible controls

Note: Until our own rollback netcode is ready, it is possible to use a remote desktop app such as Parsec to play online.  More info on that in the Discord.

Controller Support

  • Gamecube (With MayFlash Adapter)
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox 360
  • PlayStation 4

Notes on Controllers: Other controllers may be compatible but have not been tested. Gamecube controllers were tested using the MayFlash adapter. Gamecube controllers using the MayFlash adapter DO NOT work over the remote desktop program, Parsec.
